pr_title: Make Flake Finder more debuggable, fix PMD running multiple times

timeline.bodyText: A quick reformat on this file, please!
timeline.author: leaf94

timeline.bodyText: Do we plan to live with this violation?
timeline.author: shaguptashaikh

replies.bodyText: Yes, assignment in operand isn't a big deal, especially in a test.
replies.author: MikeDombo

replies.bodyText: Yes, it is a false flag, we do actually close the resource, so nothing to worry about.
replies.author: MikeDombo
